item.title: Vim配置python开发环境
item.description: 功能:代码提示,代码补全,语法检查,snippet补全 系统和软件版本: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ vim --version VIM - Vi IMproved 8.2 (2019 Dec 12, compiled Mar 26 2021 00:21:09) Included patches: 1-2653 Compiled by Arch Linux $ uname -a Linux kamisama-20e0a013cd
